org.apache.poi.xwpf.usermodel

Class XWPFRun

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.poi.xwpf.usermodel.XWPFRun
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CharacterRun, IRunElement, ISDTContents
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    XWPFFieldRun, XWPFHyperlinkRun 

    public class XWPFRun
extends java.lang.Object
implements ISDTContents, IRunElement, CharacterRun
    XWPFRun object defines a region of text with a common set of properties(XWPFRun对象使用一组通用属性定义文本区域)

      • isBold

        public boolean isBold()
        Whether the bold property shall be applied to all non-complex script characters in the contents of this run when displayed in a document(显示在文档中时，粗体属性是否应应用于此运行内容中的所有非复杂脚本字符)
        Specified by:
        isBold in interface CharacterRun(界面显示器中的粗体运行)
        Returns:
        true if the bold property is applied(如果应用了bold属性，则为true)

      • setBold

        public void setBold(boolean value)
        Whether the bold property shall be applied to all non-complex script characters in the contents of this run when displayed in a document.

        This formatting property is a toggle property, which specifies that its behavior differs between its use within a style definition and its use as direct formatting. When used as part of a style definition, setting this property shall toggle the current state of that property as specified up to this point in the hierarchy (i.e. applied to not applied, and vice versa). Setting it to false (or an equivalent) shall result in the current setting remaining unchanged. However, when used as direct formatting, setting this property to true or false shall set the absolute state of the resulting property.

        If this element is not present, the default value is to leave the formatting applied at previous level in the style hierarchy. If this element is never applied in the style hierarchy, then bold shall not be applied to non-complex script characters.

        (显示在文档中时，粗体属性是否应应用于此运行内容中的所有非复杂脚本字符。此格式设置属性是一个切换属性，它指定在样式定义中使用它和将它用作直接格式设置时，其行为有所不同。当作为样式定义的一部分使用时，设置此属性应切换该属性的当前状态，如在层次结构中的此点所指定的（即，应用到未应用，反之亦然）。将其设置为false（或等效值）应导致当前设置保持不变。但是，当用作直接格式时，将此属性设置为true或False将设置结果属性的绝对状态。如果此元素不存在，默认值是保留在样式层次结构中的上一级别应用的格式。如果此元素从未应用于风格层次结构中，则粗体不应应用于非复杂的脚本字符。)
        Specified by:
        setBold in interface CharacterRun(界面中的set粗体字符运行)
        Parameters:
        value - true if the bold property is applied to this run(值-如果粗体属性应用于此运行，则为真)

        public java.lang.String getColor()
        Get text color. The returned value is a string in the hex form "RRGGBB".(获取文本颜色。返回的值是十六进制形式“RRGGBB”的字符串。)

      • setItalic

        public void setItalic(boolean value)
        Whether the bold property shall be applied to all non-complex script characters in the contents of this run when displayed in a document

        This formatting property is a toggle property, which specifies that its behavior differs between its use within a style definition and its use as direct formatting. When used as part of a style definition, setting this property shall toggle the current state of that property as specified up to this point in the hierarchy (i.e. applied to not applied, and vice versa). Setting it to false (or an equivalent) shall result in the current setting remaining unchanged. However, when used as direct formatting, setting this property to true or false shall set the absolute state of the resulting property.

        If this element is not present, the default value is to leave the formatting applied at previous level in the style hierarchy. If this element is never applied in the style hierarchy, then bold shall not be applied to non-complex script characters.

        (当显示在文档中时，粗体属性是否应应用于此运行内容中的所有非复杂脚本字符此格式属性是一个切换属性，它指定其在样式定义中的使用和用作直接格式之间的行为不同。当作为样式定义的一部分使用时，设置此属性应切换该属性的当前状态，如在层次结构中的此点所指定的（即，应用到未应用，反之亦然）。将其设置为false（或等效值）应导致当前设置保持不变。但是，当用作直接格式时，将此属性设置为true或False将设置结果属性的绝对状态。如果此元素不存在，默认值是保留在样式层次结构中的上一级别应用的格式。如果此元素从未应用于风格层次结构中，则粗体不应应用于非复杂的脚本字符。)
        Specified by:
        setItalic in interface CharacterRun(界面中的setItalic打印机运行)
        Parameters:
        value - true if the italic property is applied to this run(值-如果Italic属性应用于此运行，则为真)

      • getUnderline

        public UnderlinePatterns getUnderline()
        Get the underline setting for the run.(获取跑步的底线设置。)
        Returns:
        the Underline pattern applied to this run(应用于此运行的虚线图案)
        See Also:
        (@link UnderlinePatterns}

      • setUnderline

        public void setUnderline(UnderlinePatterns value)
        Specifies that the contents of this run should be displayed along with an underline appearing directly below the character height.

        If this element is not present, the default value is to leave the formatting applied at previous level in the style hierarchy. If this element is never applied in the style hierarchy, then an underline shall not be applied to the contents of this run.

        (指定此运行的内容应与字符高度正下方出现的下线一起显示。如果此元素不存在，默认值是保留在样式层次结构中的上一级别应用的格式。如果此元素从未应用于样式层次结构中，则不应将下划线应用于此运行的内容。)
        Parameters:
        value - - underline type(值- -下线类型)
        See Also:
        UnderlinePatterns} : all possible patterns that could be applied

      • setUnderlineColor

        public void setUnderlineColor(java.lang.String color)
        Set the underline color for the run's underline, if any.(设置运行的底线颜色（如果有的话）。)
        Parameters:
        color - An RGB color value (e.g, "a0C6F3") or "auto".(颜色-一个Ruby颜色值（例如，“a0 C6 F3”）或“Auto”。)
        Since:
        4.0.0

      • setStrikeThrough

        public void setStrikeThrough(boolean value)
        Specifies that the contents of this run shall be displayed with a single horizontal line through the center of the line.

        This formatting property is a toggle property, which specifies that its behaviour differs between its use within a style definition and its use as direct formatting. When used as part of a style definition, setting this property shall toggle the current state of that property as specified up to this point in the hierarchy (i.e. applied to not applied, and vice versa). Setting it to false (or an equivalent) shall result in the current setting remaining unchanged. However, when used as direct formatting, setting this property to true or false shall set the absolute state of the resulting property.

        If this element is not present, the default value is to leave the formatting applied at previous level in the style hierarchy. If this element is never applied in the style hierarchy, then strikethrough shall not be applied to the contents of this run.

        (指定此运行的内容应通过线中心的一条水平线显示。此格式属性是一个切换属性，它指定其在样式定义中的使用和用作直接格式的使用之间的行为不同。当作为样式定义的一部分使用时，设置此属性应切换该属性的当前状态，如在层次结构中的此点所指定的（即，应用到未应用，反之亦然）。将其设置为false（或等效值）应导致当前设置保持不变。但是，当用作直接格式时，将此属性设置为true或False将设置结果属性的绝对状态。如果此元素不存在，默认值是保留在样式层次结构中的上一级别应用的格式。如果此元素从未应用于样式层次结构中，则删除线不应应用于此运行的内容。)
        Specified by:
        setStrikeThrough in interface CharacterRun(在界面中设置StrikeThrough ButterRun)
        Parameters:
        value - true if the strike property is applied to this run(值-如果罢工属性应用于此运行，则为真)

      • setSubscript

        public void setSubscript(VerticalAlign valign)
        Specifies the alignment which shall be applied to the contents of this run in relation to the default appearance of the run's text. This allows the text to be repositioned as subscript or superscript without altering the font size of the run properties.

        If this element is not present, the default value is to leave the formatting applied at previous level in the style hierarchy. If this element is never applied in the style hierarchy, then the text shall not be subscript or superscript relative to the default baseline location for the contents of this run.

        (指定应用于此运行内容的与运行文本的默认外观相关的对齐方式。这允许将文本重新定位为下标或上标，而不更改运行属性的字体大小。如果此元素不存在，默认值是保留在样式层次结构中的上一级别应用的格式。如果此元素从未在样式层次结构中应用，则文本不应相对于此运行内容的默认基线位置为下标或上标。)
        Parameters:
        valign - Type of vertical align to apply(valign -要应用的垂直对齐类型)
        See Also:
        VerticalAlign

      • getFontFamily

        public java.lang.String getFontFamily()

        Returns:
        a string representing the font family(代表字体系列的字符串)

      • setFontFamily

        public void setFontFamily(java.lang.String fontFamily)
        Specifies the fonts which shall be used to display the text contents of this run. Specifies a font which shall be used to format all characters in the ASCII range (0 - 127) within the parent run.

        Also sets the other font ranges, if they haven't been set before

        (指定用于显示此次运行文本内容的字体。指定用于格式化父运行中的所有字符的字体（0 - 127）。如果以前没有设置过，还可以设置其他字体范围)

      • getFontFamily

        public java.lang.String getFontFamily(XWPFRun.FontCharRange fcr)
        Gets the font family for the specified font char range. If fcr is null, the font char range "ascii" is used(获取指定字体字符范围的字体系列。如果fCR为空，则使用字体字符范围“assume”)
        Parameters:
        fcr - the font char range, defaults to "ansi"(fCR -字体字符范围，默认为“ansi”)
        Returns:
        a string representing the font famil(代表字体系列的字符串)

      • setFontFamily

        public void setFontFamily(java.lang.String fontFamily,
                          XWPFRun.FontCharRange fcr)
        Specifies the fonts which shall be used to display the text contents of this run. The default handling for fcr == null is to overwrite the ascii font char range with the given font family and also set all not specified font ranges(指定用于显示此次运行文本内容的字体。fCR ==空的默认处理是用给定的字体系列覆盖assume字体字符范围，并设置所有未指定的字体范围)
        Parameters:
        fontFamily - The font family to apply(fontFamily -要应用的字体系列)
        fcr - FontCharRange or null for default handling(fcr - FontCharRange或null用于默认处理)

      • setFontSize

        public void setFontSize(int size)

        If this element is not present, the default value is to leave the value applied at previous level in the style hierarchy. If this element is never applied in the style hierarchy, then any appropriate font size may be used for non complex script characters.

        (指定显示时应应用于此运行内容中所有非复杂脚本字符的字体大小。如果此元素不存在，默认值是保留在样式层次结构中上一级别应用的值。如果此元素从未应用于样式层次结构中，则可以将任何适当的字体大小用于非复杂的脚本字符。)

      • getTextPosition

        public int getTextPosition()
        This element specifies the amount by which text shall be raised or lowered for this run in relation to the default baseline of the surrounding non-positioned text. This allows the text to be repositioned without altering the font size of the contents.(此元素指定此运行中文本相对于周围未定位文本的默认基线应升高或降低的量。这允许在不改变内容字体大小的情况下重新定位文本。)
        Returns:
        a big integer representing the amount of text shall be "moved"(表示文本数量的大整数将被“移动”)

      • setTextPosition

        public void setTextPosition(int val)
        This element specifies the amount by which text shall be raised or lowered for this run in relation to the default baseline of the surrounding non-positioned text. This allows the text to be repositioned without altering the font size of the contents.

        If the val attribute is positive, then the parent run shall be raised above the baseline of the surrounding text by the specified number of half-points. If the val attribute is negative, then the parent run shall be lowered below the baseline of the surrounding text by the specified number of half-points.

        If this element is not present, the default value is to leave the formatting applied at previous level in the style hierarchy. If this element is never applied in the style hierarchy, then the text shall not be raised or lowered relative to the default baseline location for the contents of this run.

        (此元素指定此运行中文本相对于周围未定位文本的默认基线应升高或降低的量。这允许在不改变内容字体大小的情况下重新定位文本。如果val属性为正值，则父运行应在周围文本的基线上方升高指定数量的半点。如果val属性为负，则父运行应低于周围文本的基线指定的半点数。如果此元素不存在，默认值是保留在样式层次结构中的上一级别应用的格式。如果此元素从未应用于样式层次结构中，则文本不得相对于此运行内容的默认基线位置升高或降低。)
        Parameters:
        val - Positive values will raise the baseline of the text, negative values will lower it.(val -正值将提高文本的基线，负值将降低文本的基线。)

      • removeBreak

        public void removeBreak()

      • addBreak

        public void addBreak()
        Specifies that a break shall be placed at the current location in the run content. A break is a special character which is used to override the normal line breaking that would be performed based on the normal layout of the document's contents.(指定应在运行内容的当前位置放置休息。分隔符是一种特殊字符，用于覆盖根据文档内容的正常布局执行的正常行分隔符。)
        See Also:
        addCarriageReturn()

      • addBreak

        public void addBreak(BreakType type)
        Specifies that a break shall be placed at the current location in the run content. A break is a special character which is used to override the normal line breaking that would be performed based on the normal layout of the document's contents.

        The behavior of this break character (the location where text shall be restarted after this break) shall be determined by its type values.

        (指定应在运行内容的当前位置放置休息。分隔符是一种特殊字符，用于覆盖根据文档内容的正常布局执行的正常行分隔符。此中断字符的行为（此中断后文本重新启动的位置）应由其类型值确定。)
        See Also:
        BreakType

      • addBreak

        public void addBreak(BreakClear clear)
        Specifies that a break shall be placed at the current location in the run content. A break is a special character which is used to override the normal line breaking that would be performed based on the normal layout of the document's contents.

        The behavior of this break character (the location where text shall be restarted after this break) shall be determined by its type (in this case is BreakType.TEXT_WRAPPING as default) and clear attribute values.

        (指定应在运行内容的当前位置放置休息。分隔符是一种特殊字符，用于覆盖根据文档内容的正常布局执行的正常行分隔符。此中断字符的行为（此中断后文本重新启动的位置）应由其类型（在本例中，默认为BreakType. TEK_WRAPPING）和清晰属性值确定。)
        See Also:
        BreakClear

      • addTab

        Specifies that a tab shall be placed at the current location in the run content.(指定选项卡应放置在管路内容中的当前位置。)

      • removeTab

        public void removeTab()

      • addCarriageReturn

        public void addCarriageReturn()
        Specifies that a carriage return shall be placed at the current location in the run content. A carriage return is used to end the current line of text in Wordprocess. The behavior of a carriage return in run content shall be identical to a break character with null type and clear attributes, which shall end the current line and find the next available line on which to continue. The carriage return character forced the following text to be restarted on the next available line in the document.(指定将返回符放置在运行内容的当前位置。回车符用于结束Wordprocess中的当前文本行。运行内容中回车符的行为应与具有空类型和清除属性的中断字符相同，它应结束当前行并查找下一个可用行以继续。回车符强制以下文本在文档中的下一个可用行重新开始。)

      • removeCarriageReturn

        public void removeCarriageReturn()

      • addPicture

        public XWPFPicture addPicture(java.io.InputStream pictureData,
                              int pictureType,
                              java.lang.String filename,
                              int width,
                              int height)
                       throws InvalidFormatException,
                              java.io.IOException
        Adds a picture to the run. This method handles attaching the picture data to the overall file.(将图片添加到跑步中。此方法处理将图片数据附加到整个文件。)
        Parameters:
        pictureData - The raw picture data(pictureData -原始图片数据)
        pictureType - The type of the picture, eg Document.PICTURE_TYPE_JPEG(pictureType -图片的类型，例如文档。PICUTE_TYPEG_JPEG)
        width - width in EMUs. To convert to / from points use Units(宽度-EMU中的宽度。要使用单位转换为/从点转换)
        height - height in EMUs. To convert to / from points use Units(height -EMU中的高度。要使用单位转换为/从点转换)
        Throws:
        InvalidFormatException - If the format of the picture is not known.(InvalidSYS异常-如果图片的格式未知。)
        java.io.IOException - If reading the picture-data from the stream fails.(java.io. IOResponse-如果从流中读取图片数据失败。)
        See Also:
        Document.PICTURE_TYPE_EMF, Document.PICTURE_TYPE_WMF, Document.PICTURE_TYPE_PICT, Document.PICTURE_TYPE_JPEG, Document.PICTURE_TYPE_PNG, Document.PICTURE_TYPE_DIB

      • getEmphasisMark

        public org.openxmlformats.schemas.wordprocessingml.x2006.main.STEm.Enum getEmphasisMark()
        Get the emphasis mark value for the run.(获取跑步的强调标记值。)
        Returns:
        STEm.Enum emphasis mark type enumeration. See 17.18.24 ST_Em (Emphasis Mark Type).(STEm.Enum强调标记类型列举。请参阅17.18.24 ST_Em（强调标记类型）。)
        Since:
        4.0.0

      • setEmphasisMark

        public void setEmphasisMark(java.lang.String markType)
        Set the emphasis mark for the run. The emphasis mark goes above or below the run text.(设置跑步的强调标记。强调标记位于运行文本的上方或下方。)
        Parameters:
        markType - Emphasis mark type name, e.g., "dot" or "none". See 17.18.24 ST_Em (Emphasis Mark Type)(markType -强调标记类型名称，例如，“点”或“无”。参见17.18.24 ST_Em（强调标记类型）)
        Since:
        4.0.0

      • getRunProperties

        protected org.openxmlformats.schemas.wordprocessingml.x2006.main.CTRPr getRunProperties(boolean create)
        Get the run properties for the run.(获取运行的运行属性。)
        Parameters:
        create - If true, create the properties, if false, do not.(创建-如果为真，则创建属性，如果为假，则不创建属性。)
        Returns:
        The run properties or null if there are no properties and create is false.(run属性，如果没有属性则为null，并且create为false。)
